name: AAA Dynamic Scenes
summary: AAA Dynamic Scenes allows you to transform your screen into a device that grants you power of surveying space and time. Immerse yourself in beautifully animated vistas from the farthest reaches of the universe - feast your eyes on the many futures and pasts from the great beyond. The application can also function as a screen saver displaying date and time over the scapes and at a touch of a button can turn each scene into a jigsaw puzzle providing you with entertainment. This product contains five scapes - your experience can be expanded by purchasing additional 35 vistas - please see available packs in items related to this product.
